no - the account/user with the given username is not logged in.

member.summary: Formats the Name. the default format is prefix{p} first{f} middle{m} last{l} suffix{s}.
member.param: the following formatting directives can be used to create a different result example ToString("{l}, {f} {m}") ==> Smith, Jim R. {p} the Name.PrefixCode value {f} the Name.First value {m} the Name.Middle value {l} the Name.Last value {s} the Name.SuffixCode value
member.returns: The formatted string of the name.
